thread.title: Stocks in Europe and Asia Follow Wall Street Lower

author: Riva Gold
title: Stocks in Europe and Asia Follow Wall Street Lower

locations.name: asia follow wall street lower chip

text:
U.S. stocks fall on renewed trade worries Bond prices continue rising Chinese data beat forecasts Shares of industrial and materials firms pushed the Dow Jones Industrial Average and S&P 500 lower for the third straight session Wednesday, as investors weighed new signs that protectionist trade policies could spread.
Stocks had come under pressure earlier in the month as investors worried that U.S. tariffs on steel and aluminum could hurt firms that use the metals to manufacture goods. And some are concerned that other...
